pages.text: Mottomo fukona monodenai kagiri, dare mo sore de yaka renai
Soreha (shinri o) usodearu to ii somuki satta-sha
Daga (omo no tame ni) chusei no kagiri o tsukushita mono wa, sorekara sukuwa re
sono tomi o hodokoshi, jibun o kiyomeru
Mata dareka-ra mo, jihi no hoshu o motomenai
Isshokenmei ni shikosha,-nushi no mikao o kou dakedearu
Yagate, kare wa (jubun ni) manzoku dekirudearou
Asa (no kagayaki) ni oite
seijakuna yoru ni oite (chikau)
Omo wa, anata o misute rarezu, nikuma reta wakede mo nai
Hontoni raise (shorai) wa, anata ni totte utsushiyo (genzai) yori, motto yoi nodearu
Yagate omo wa anata no manzoku suru mono o o sazuke ni naru
Kare wa minashigo no anata o mitsuke rare, higo nasa retade wanai ka
Kare wa samayotte ita anata o mitsukete, michibiki o atae
Mata mazushi anata o mitsukete, yufuku ni nasa retade wanai ka
Dakara minashigo o shitagete wa naranai
Kou mono o ÊèÜ Ne tsukete wa naranai
Anata no omo no onkei o nobetsutaeru ga i
Ware wa, anata no mune o hirogenakatta ka
Anata kara omoni o kudashitade wanai ka
Sore wa, anata no senaka o oshitsukete ita
Mata ware wa, anata no meisei o takametade wanai ka
Hontoni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa ari
hontoni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa aru
Sore de (tomen no tsutome kara) raku ni nattara, sarani roku shite
